statements: SELECT * FROM TransportationCarbonFootprint;
SELECT service_name, carbon_emission FROM TransportationCarbonFootprint WHERE carbon_emission > 50;
SELECT service_name, transport_type FROM TransportationCarbonFootprint WHERE transport_type = 'bus';
SELECT * FROM TransportationCarbonFootprint ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC;
SELECT AVG(carbon_emission) FROM TransportationCarbonFootprint GROUP BY transport_type;
SELECT * FROM TransportationCarbonFootprint WHERE carbon_emission > 50 ORDER BY service_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT service_name, transport_type FROM TransportationCarbonFootprint WHERE service_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY carbon_emission ASC;
SELECT service_name, carbon_emission FROM TransportationCarbonFootprint WHERE transport_type = 'Train' OR transport_type = 'Bus' AND carbon_emission < 30 ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC;
SELECT service_id, service_name FROM TransportationCarbonFootprint WHERE carbon_emission BETWEEN 20 AND 80 ORDER BY service_id ASC, carbon_emission DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT transport_type FROM TransportationCarbonFootprint WHERE carbon_emission >= 40;
SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprint
SELECT id, service_name, carbon_emissions FROM CarbonFootprint
SELECT service_name, carbon_emissions FROM CarbonFootprint ORDER BY carbon_emissions DESC
SELECT * FROM Traveler
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name FROM Traveler ORDER BY traveler_name
SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprint WHERE carbon_emissions > 100
SELECT service_name, carbon_emissions FROM CarbonFootprint WHERE carbon_emissions BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY service_name DESC
SELECT AVG(carbon_emissions) AS avg_emissions FROM CarbonFootprint
SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM CarbonFootprint GROUP BY service_name HAVING total_records > 1
SELECT CF.service_name, T.traveler_name FROM CarbonFootprint CF JOIN Traveler T ON CF.id = T.traveler_id
SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprint;
SELECT service_id, service_name FROM CarbonFootprint WHERE carbon_emission > 0;
SELECT tourist_name, email FROM Tourists WHERE city='Paris';
SELECT * FROM TransportationServices ORDER BY transport_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(carbon_emission) AS average_carbon_emission FROM CarbonFootprint;
SELECT service_name, carbon_emission FROM CarbonFootprint WHERE carbon_emission > 5.0 ORDER BY service_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Tourists WHERE city = 'Paris';
SELECT transport_name, carbon_emission_per_km FROM TransportationServices WHERE carbon_emission_per_km < 0.1 ORDER BY transport_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, carbon_emission FROM CarbonFootprint WHERE carbon_emission BETWEEN 2.0 AND 8.0;
SELECT * FROM TransportationServices WHERE carbon_emission_per_km > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM Tourists;
SELECT name, email FROM Tourists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransportationServices WHERE carbon_emission_per_km > 5;
SELECT service_name, carbon_emission_per_km FROM TransportationServices ORDER BY carbon_emission_per_km ASC;
SELECT t.name, c.carbon_emission FROM Trips tr JOIN Tourists t ON tr.tourist_id = t.tourist_id JOIN CarbonFootprint c ON tr.trip_id = c.trip_id WHERE c.carbon_emission > 50 ORDER BY t.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Tourists;
SELECT name, email FROM Tourists ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT t.name, ts.service_name, c.carbon_emission FROM Tourists t JOIN Trips tr ON t.tourist_id = tr.tourist_id JOIN TransportationServices ts ON tr.service_id = ts.service_id JOIN CarbonFootprint c ON tr.trip_id = c.trip_id WHERE ts.carbon_emission_per_km > 5 ORDER BY ts.carbon_emission_per_km ASC;
SELECT t.name, COUNT(tr.trip_id) AS num_trips FROM Tourists t LEFT JOIN Trips tr ON t.tourist_id = tr.tourist_id GROUP BY t.name HAVING num_trips > 2 ORDER BY num_trips DESC;

SELECT t.name, tr.distance_km, ts.service_name FROM Tourists t JOIN Trips tr ON t.tourist_id = tr.tourist_id JOIN TransportationServices ts ON tr.service_id = ts.service_id WHERE tr.distance_km > 100 ORDER BY tr.distance_km DESC, ts.service_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Tourists;
SELECT tourist_name, nationality FROM Tourists WHERE age > 30;
SELECT service_name, carbon_footprint FROM TransportServices ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC;
SELECT * FROM Trips WHERE distance_travelled > 1000 ORDER BY date_of_trip ASC;
SELECT company_name, location, carbon_rating FROM TransportCompanies WHERE carbon_rating > 3 ORDER BY company_name;
SELECT * FROM Trips WHERE distance_travelled > 500 ORDER BY date_of_trip DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT t.tourist_name, ts.service_name, tf.rating FROM Tourists t INNER JOIN Trips tr ON t.tourist_id = tr.tourist_id INNER JOIN TransportServices ts ON tr.service_id = ts.service_id INNER JOIN TripFeedback tf ON tr.trip_id = tf.trip_id WHERE tf.rating >= 4 ORDER BY tf.rating DESC, t.tourist_name ASC;

SELECT tf.feedback_text, t.tourist_name, ts.service_name FROM Tourists t INNER JOIN Trips tr ON t.tourist_id = tr.tourist_id INNER JOIN TransportServices ts ON tr.service_id = ts.service_id INNER JOIN TripFeedback tf ON tr.trip_id = tf.trip_id WHERE t.nationality = 'USA' AND ts.carbon_footprint <= 5 ORDER BY tf.feedback_text ASC;

SELECT tc.company_name, t.tourist_name, tr.date_of_trip FROM Tourists t INNER JOIN Trips tr ON t.tourist_id = tr.tourist_id INNER JOIN TransportServices ts ON tr.service_id = ts.service_id INNER JOIN TransportCompanies tc ON ts.carbon_footprint <= 5 ORDER BY tc.company_name DESC, t.tourist_name ASC;

SELECT tr.date_of_trip, ts.service_name, tf.rating, tr.distance_travelled FROM Trips tr INNER JOIN TransportServices ts ON tr.service_id = ts.service_id INNER JOIN TripFeedback tf ON tr.trip_id = tf.trip_id ORDER BY tr.date_of_trip ASC, tr.distance_travelled DESC;
